purpose: Share Anup's testimonial about how Titan PMR frees up time for Pharmacy First and private services, positioning The Titan Way as a workflow that actually works for pharmacy teams.
core_message: More time for Pharmacy First and private services. A workflow that actually works for pharmacy teams. With services expanding, pharmacists need time to focus on care—not admin. Titan PMR helps make that a reality.
summary: Short testimonial video featuring Anup discussing how Titan PMR reduces admin and unnecessary steps, freeing up time for Pharmacy First and private services. Highlights The Titan Way: fewer steps, smarter automation, and more time for patient care.
